mdRecord.dcterms:title: James McCosh House, exterior|general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Brown, Arthur Page (American architect, 1859-1896) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "... the [Quadrangle] club acquired the [McCosh] house the University had built in 1887 as a retirement home for President McCosh and his wife, Isabella...[the club] sold the McCosh House to Lloyd Grover, who moved it to its current location on Nassau Street, a block from the intersection with Harrison Street..." -- https://www.princetonianamuseum.org/reference/bd8c38ce-29aa-4acf-a309-8b1c1deb82db [work]
"... In recent years, the mansion had been divided into two large condominium units..." -- https://closeup.brianrudnick.com/2013/03/mccosh-house.html [work]
